summary:
## Oak Trees: Strong and Important

Oaks are strong trees found mostly in the Northern Hemisphere. They have unique leaves and produce acorns. There are over 500 species, some deciduous and some evergreen. Oaks are important for many animals and have been around for millions of years.

People use oak wood for building and making furniture. Oak barrels give special flavors to wine and whiskey. Unfortunately, many oak species are in danger due to climate change and pests.

The oak tree symbolizes strength and is important in many cultures.
title: Oak
